programme.title: Freedom of Information
programme.short_synopsis: Should the Department of Defence publish a list of Iraqi casualties from the Gulf War?
programme.medium_synopsis: The American Department of Defence's publication of Iraqi casualties from the Gulf War leads Alistair Cooke to explore the uses and abuses of the Freedom of Information Act.
